name: The Curse of Svaltfen
description:
The Curse of Svaltfen is an old-school rpg.

Unravel the mysteries of a cursed land in this lost 8-bit rpg epic. Summoned from blissful oblivion by shadowy manipulators of your destiny, you set forth across a land in crisis. It seems your arrival is well timed to conincide with an ominous prophesy: the hordes of the underworld have found a new leader and are amassing to destroy humanity.
